price: (55) Do they think that what We extend to them of wealth and children
arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّمَا نُمِدُّهُم بِهِۦ مِن مَّالٖ وَبَنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: ayaḥsabūna annamā numidduhum bihi min mālin wabanīna
